links.title: Trump: 'We are not in a trade war with China, that war was lost many years ago'
links.description: President Donald Trump tweeted Wednesday morning that the U.S. is not in a trade war with China - and "that war was lost many years ago" by previous U.S. leadership. "We are not in a trade war with China, that war was lost many years ago by the foolish, or incompetent, people who represented the U.S.," Trump said in a tweet.

Spotify Hits The Market In Unusual Debut https://benzinga.com/z/11462740 $SPOT $AAPL $BABA $P

links.title: Spotify Hits Market In Unusual Debut (NYSE:SPOT)
links.description: Spotify Technology S.A. (NYSE: SPOT) traded for the first time on a U.S. public stock exchange Tuesday. Traders and investors anxiously awaited Spotify's debut. There were more than a dozen indications throughout the morning, with the stock finally opening around 12:44 p.m. ET at $165.90 per share, which was well ahead of the IPO reference price of $132.
